question: What are the basic rules of beach volleyball and generate an image of a beach volleyball match?

steps.content: What are the basic rules of beach volleyball and generate an image of a beach volleyball match?
Plan: 1) Search for the basic rules of beach volleyball. 2) Generate an image of a beach volleyball match. 3) Return the answer.
Searching for the basic rules of beach volleyball.

Basic rules of beach volleyball: 1) Teams consist of two players. 2) Matches are played best of three sets. 3) Each set is played to 21 points, with a two-point margin needed to win. 4) Players are not allowed to touch the net.
Generating an image of a beach volleyball match.
Image of a beach volleyball match generated.
